Name Rascal/Libraries/Message

Syntax 
data Message = error(str msg, loc at)
             | warning(str msg, loc at)
             | info(str msg, loc at);
Description Messages can be used to communicate information about source texts. They can be interpreted by IDEs to display type errors and warnings, etc. Messages are, for instance, used as Tree annotations.
[Edit] | [New] | [Compile Course] | [Warnings]
